description: The government says 16 and 17-year-olds should be able to seek an abortion without parental consent.
title: Spain abortion: Government works to repeal parental consent rule
title_page: Spain abortion: Government works to repeal parental consent rule - BBC News
maintext: The government is aiming to repeal the reform - introduced by the PP in 2015 - which established the obligation of parental consent in the case of girls between 16 and 18-years-old who wanted to end their pregnancy.
